title: Tapping on My Favorite Player & Team link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I have access to the new M Players & Teams module in the app
custom_steps:
WHEN I navigate to the Account Settings page
AND I tap on the `My Players & Teams` link
AND I am tracking the events in Charles with filter "mlb.sc"
custom_expected: THEN I should see the following details in the tracking event: favorite team: team.favorite, followed teams: user.favoriteTeams, followed players: user.favoritePlayers

title: Tapping on the "Edit" icon will trigger an event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the MLB app 
AND I am logged in
AND I am on the My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I have some teams and players I am following
AND I see an Edit button on top right hand corner in the My Players & Teams page
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Edit"
AND I follow the tracking calls in Charles with filter on "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following value in the tracking event: trackAction - "FieldPass: My Players & Teams : Edit Click" 
AND I should see the following value in the tracking event: action.element.text: Edit

title: Tapping on "Done" will trigger event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I have some teams and players I am following
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the "Follow More Players & Teams" button
AND I tap on "Done" button on top right hand corner of the modal
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an even triggering
AND I should see the following events:
trackAction: MLB App : <iOS|Android> : FieldPass : Team Roster <clubAbbreviation> : Done Click
action.element.text: done

title: Tapping on "Add Teams" will trigger event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I am NOT following any team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Teams" link
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action: MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : My Players & Teams : Add Teams Click
- text: Add Your Favorite Team

title: Tapping on "Add Players" will trigger event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I am NOT following any players
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Players" link
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action:	MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : My Players & Teams : Add Players Click
- text:	Add Players

title: Tapping on "Add your favorite team" will trigger an event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I do not have a favorite team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add your favorite team" link
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:
trackAction:	MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : My Players & Teams : Add Your Favorite Team Click
action.element.text:	Add Your Favorite Team

title: Favorite team tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I have the Chicago White Sox as my favorite team
AND I am following these teams: Arizona Diamondbacks, Atlanta Braves, Baltimore Orioles and Chicago Cubs
AND I am following these players: Aaron Judge, Joey Votto, Sohei Ohtani and Juan Sotto
custom_steps:
WHEN I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I track the tracking events in Charles
AND I filter the calls with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following results in a tracking call

trackState:	MLB App : iOS: FieldPass : My Players & Teams
team.favorite	CWS
user.favoriteTeams	ARI,ATL,BAL,CHC
user.favoritePlayers	592450, 458015, 660271, 665742
user.teamsCount. 	4
user.playersCount	1

title: Adding  favorite team will be recorded by Adobe tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I do not have a favorite team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the "Add your favorite team" link
AND I tap on Chicago White Sox
AND I track the tracking events in Charles
AND I filter the calls with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a tracking call with the following events:
trackState:	MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : Favorite Team Select

AND I should also see a different call with the following:
trackAction:	MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : Favorite Team Select : Add <team abbreviation>
action.element.text:	Chicago White Sox
team.traffic	CWS

title: Updating favorite team will be recorded by Adobe tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I have the Chicago Cubs as my favorite team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the "Chicago White Sox" team link
AND I tap on Chicago White Sox
AND I track the tracking events in Charles
AND I filter the calls with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a tracking call with the following events:
trackState: MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : Favorite Team Select

AND I should also see a different call with the following:
trackAction:	MLB App : iOS : FieldPass : Favorite Team Select : Remove CHC
action.element.index:	8
action.element.text:	Chicago White Sox
team.traffic	CWS

title: Tapping on My Players & Teams should trigger an event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on the Account Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "MY Players & Teams" page
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action:	MLB App : iPhone : More : Account Settings : My Players & Teams Click
- index:	0
- text:	My Players & Teams

title: Login wall tracking - Click on Log In link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am not logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Players" link
AND I tap on "Log in" link
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action: MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Create Account Modal
AND I should see another call with the following values:

- action	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Create Account Modal : Log In Click
- text	Log In

title: Login Wall - closing the modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am not logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Players" link
AND I tap on the "X" to close the modal
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

 - action	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Create Account Modal : Exit Click

title: Login wall tracking - Create Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am not logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Players" link
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Create Account Modal : Create An Account Button Click
- index	0
- text	Create An Account

title: Searching with random text "adlfjaldfj"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I am following some players (doesn't matter which players)
AND I am following some teams (team name is not important)
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Follow More Players & Teams" button
AND I tap on search box and enter "adlfjaldfj" 
AND I  tap search
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Follow Players & Teams : Search : No Results

title: Removing favorite team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND Chicago White Sox is my favorite team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Edit"
AND I tap on "delete" icon 
AND I confirm the removal
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action:	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : My Players & Teams : Remove Favorite Team Click
- text:	Remove
- favorite:	CWS
- traffic:	CWS

title: Repositioning followed players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I am following "Aaron Loup"
AND I am following "Austin Hays"
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Edit"
AND I tap on the hamburger icon next to "Aaron Loup" on the right side
AND I drag it down to the bottom of list
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
And I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action:	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : My Players & Teams : Reposition Player Click
- text:	Reposition
- id:	623205
- favoritePlayers:	623205,669720

custom_steps:

title: Tapping on "FOLLOW" pill on a team
custom_preconds:

AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I am not following New York Yankees
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the "Follow More Players & Teams" button
AND I tap on "Teams" tab
AND I tap on FOLLOW pill next to New York Yankees team
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
AND I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action:	MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Follow Players & Teams : Follow Team Click
- text:	        Follow
- traffic:	NYY
- index:	18

custom_steps:

AND I tap on "Teams" tab

AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
AND I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:

text: Unfollow
traffic: NYY

title: Follow by search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in to the MLB app
AND I am on My Players & Teams page in the app
AND I am not following Baltimore Orioles
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the "Follow More Players & Teams" button
AND I tap on "Teams" tab
AND I search for "Bal"
AND I tap on "FOLLOW" pill next to Baltimore Orioles
AND I am looking into the event using Charles Proxy
AND I am filtering the event with "mlb.sc"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an event with the following values:

- action: MLB At Bat : iPhone : FieldPass : Follow Players & Teams : Search : Follow Team From Search Click
- text: Follow
- traffic: BAL
